articles.author: GZERO Staff
articles.title: Ian Bremmer’s 2024 elections halftime report - GZERO Media
articles.description: Ian Bremmer unpacks the results of major 2024 elections in Mexico, South Africa, India, and Taiwan in GZERO’s “Year of Elections” Halftime Report
articles.content: 2024 is fast becoming the most intense year of democracy the world has ever seen. Some 4 billion people, nearly half the global population, are casting ballots in at least 70 countries. With so many … [+710 chars]
